Recurring themes: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together. Social innovation lets us go far. #SurreyInnovates
Recurring themes: government's role in social innovation is to convene the conversations to move us forward. #SurreyInnovates
Recurring themes: social innovation only grows in the context of community (the art and act of belonging). #SurreyInnovates
Recurring themes: social innovation is about trust and relationships. #SurreyInnovates
Recurring themes: within the different meanings and definitions of social innovation, we all have a voice. #SurreyInnovates
Recurring themes: social innovation studies and supports the conditions that allow human beings to flourish. #SurreyInnovates
Recurring themes: social innovation is about networks & problem-solving to bring in our community members on the margins. #SurreyInnovates
Recurring themes: social innovation has something for everyone. Socialization enables us to explore new opportunities. #SurreyInnovates
Recurring themes: social innovation is all about outcomes. Get lean, get going, and share. #SurreyInnovates
Recurring themes: social innovation requires partnerships. And different points of view. #SurreyInnovates
Recurring themes: there's no one definition of social innovation. #SurreyInnovates

A: Students themselves should be thinking about becoming social entrepreneurs themselves. #SurreyInnovates
